title: Deploy Checklist: New Expensify 2023-11-23

labels.name: 🔐 LockCashDeploys 🔐
labels.description: Prevent new code from being deployed to staging

comments.body:
📣 @github-actions[bot]! 📣
Please report bugs or suggest features in the #expensify-open-source Slack channel, don't directly open issues in this repo!
[Instructions here to join the channel](https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) 📖

Sorry, only members of @Expensify/Mobile-Deployers can close deploy checklists.
Reopening!

📣 @os-botify[bot]! 📣
Hey, it seems we don’t have your contributor details yet! You'll only have to do this once, and this is how we'll hire you on Upwork.
Please follow these steps:
1. Make sure you've read and understood the [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md).
2. Get the email address used to login to your Expensify account. If you don't already have an Expensify account, create one [here](https://new.expensify.com/). If you have multiple accounts (e.g. one for testing), please use your main account email.
3. Get the link to your Upwork profile. It's necessary because we only pay via Upwork. You can access it by logging in, and then clicking on your name. It'll look like [this](https://www.upwork.com/freelancers/~01ca8ad8ce36b9eceb). If you don't already have an account, sign up for one [here](https://www.upwork.com/nx/signup/?dest=home).
4. Copy the format below and paste it in a comment on this issue. Replace the placeholder text with your actual details.
![Screen Shot 2022-11-16 at 4 42 54 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30609178/231263719-a8a3b7d3-36a0-4d7f-8ad4-cebe1f560fa4.png)
Format:
```
Contributor details
Your Expensify account email: <REPLACE EMAIL HERE>
Upwork Profile Link: <REPLACE LINK HERE>
```
:rocket: All staging deploys are complete, @Expensify/applauseleads please begin QA on version https://github.com/Expensify/App/releases/tag/1.4.3-0 :rocket:

Regression is at 47% progress. 
We need exact reproduction steps for https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/29790#issuecomment-1824780314
Checking off https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31795. We CPed a fix
Checking off https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31797. We CPed a fix.

Regression is less than 1% left.  We are validating couple PRs. 
#26790 blocked with #31811
Checking off https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31830 as it wasn't confirmed yet in production...

Regression completed. Validating the last cp
#31061 failing with #31844
#30582 failing with #31829, #31833, #31836 and #31839
Checking off https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31805. We reverted the offending PR.
Checking off https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31829. We CPed a fix.

- [31834](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31834) - we have a [revert PR](https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/31854) in place
- [31854](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31836) - needs investigation. Came from [this PR](https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/30582)
- [31837](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31837) - PR with fix [here](https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/31858). Came from [30582](https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/30582)
- [31839](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31839) - needs investigation. Came from [30582](https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/30582)
- [31848](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31848) - needs investigation

Unfortunately reverting https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/30582 is not straightforward since there are many conflicts already

Checking off PRs below. We reverted the offending PR:

- https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31803
- https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31838
- https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31840
- https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31844

Ok, final update for the next deployer:

https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31834 - we have a revert PR https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/31854 in place
https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31837 - we have a fix PR https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/31858
https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31839 - we have a fix PR https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/31861, but there's [another issue](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31839#issuecomment-1826146762) that I found while testing that still needs to be addressed
https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31848 - I did not have time to investigate this one

**Deployer verifications:**
- [ ] I checked the [App Timing Dashboard](https://graphs.expensify.com/grafana/d/yj2EobAGz/app-timing?orgId=1) and verified this release does not cause a noticeable performance regression.
- [ ] I checked [Firebase Crashlytics](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/expensify-chat/crashlytics/app/android:com.expensify.chat/issues?state=open&time=last-seven-days&tag=all) and verified that this release does not introduce any new crashes. More detailed instructions on this verification can be found [here](https://stackoverflowteams.com/c/expensify/questions/15095/15096).
- [ ] I checked [GitHub Status](https://www.githubstatus.com/) and verified there is no reported incident with Actions.

cc @Expensify/applauseleads
